1541648221_1DJqae3bJR9Dz7f5QryWXywv92Jqm.body: In my opinion, we have already started the climb. The AI that is created today is much deeper in computation that could have been imagined. The rate that these intelligence "learn" or sort data is beyond human compare. A thought to give, what happens if an A.I is tasked with creating other A.I's?
